title: Base System Entity
description: The base for system-level entities (e.g., Stitch, Tenant) that manage workflows. Inherits from BaseEntity and enforces the absence of physics components (Rules 17 & 18).

entity_type.description: The canonical type of the system entity.

workflow_state.description: The current state of the entity's workflow.

not.description: Rule 17.2: System entities MUST NOT have physics components.
